lead_paragraph: GLICKENHAUS--Seth. Al Feinman and his family mourn the passing of their friend, Seth Glickenhaus. Seth was a remarkable and unique man; an adoring husband, a loving father and grandfather, a legend on Wall Street, a man of extraordinary generosity, a wonderful partner in business, and for more than 65 years as dear a friend as one can ever hope to have. The Feinmans extend their heartfelt condolences to his wife Sarah, his children Nancy and Jim, and to the entire family. We miss you and love you Seth. Alfred Feinman and Family 1/3
